name: Daring Megamorphic Fighter HAFFY
description:
On a distant planet, an invasion is taking place. The alien army of the mysterious entity known as MASTER MIND is wreaking havoc. Only one person can save the world now, a lone pilot of the ancient fighter craft of legend known as "HAFFY".

A SHMUP with an emphasis on obstacle dodging and bullet hell elements, weird enemy designs, and an aesthetic trying to stay true to its GB inspirations (without the slowdown!).
CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z/A - Fire

Enter - Pause

(Controllers are also supported, and recommended.)
